TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabelsCollection extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel>
Public Class CustomLabelsCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of CustomLabel)

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一系列对象，它又表示自定义标签对象可使用。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the custom labels that an object can use. 此类作为公开集合属性对象。This class is exposed as the collection property of an object. > [!NOTE] > 可以自动填充了自定义轴的整个标签行标签使用任何包含的方法定义`DateTimeIntervalType`参数。You can automatically populate the entire label row of an axis with custom labels using any method definition that includes a `DateTimeIntervalType` argument. 属性指示的集合中的项总数和通常用于查找集合中的上限。The property indicates the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

summary.span: 将 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType);

override this.Add : double * System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: labelsStep
param.span: 一个 ，确定自定义标签的绘制频率。

span.span: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.

param.name: intervalType
param.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定间隔类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the interval type.

summary.span: 将多个 类型的 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds multiple objects of type to the collection.

summary.span: 使用标签填充轴的整个第一行。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建并初始化对象的整个第一个标签行的与轴指定类型的标签。The method creates and initializes objects for the entire first label row of an axis with labels of the specified type. `labelsStep`参数确定将绘制自定义标签的频率。The `labelsStep` parameter determines how often the custom labels will be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 在调用此特定方法定义之前，必须在调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

param.name: fromPosition
param.span: 向其应用标签的轴范围的最小值。

span.span: The minimum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.

param.name: toPosition

span.span: The maximum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.

param.name: text
param.span: 标签文本。

span.span: The label text.

summary.span: 使用给定的轴范围和文本将 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection, using the given axis range and text.
The newly added object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将一个自定义标签添加到相关轴的第一个标签行。Adds one custom label to the first label row of the relevant axis. 不使用任何标签标记。No label mark is used. 如果第一个标签行中的任意位置使用自定义标签，任何标签都不是自动不生成的第一行。If a custom label is used anywhere in the first label row, no labels are automatically generated for that first row. > [!NOTE] > 在调用此特定方法定义之前，必须在调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

param.span: 一个 ，确定自定义标签的绘制频率。

summary.span: 使用具有特定格式的标签填充轴的整个第一行。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels with the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建并初始化对象的轴的整个第一个标签行指定类型的标签。This method creates and initializes objects for an axis' entire first label row with labels of the specified type. 在步骤确定将绘制自定义标签的频率，并可以也指定可选标签格式设置。The step determines how often the custom labels will be drawn, and optional label formatting can be specified as well. > [!NOTE] > 在调用此特定方法定义之前，必须在调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.
